thread.title: Lisa Butler
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Lisa Butler

author: Lisa Butler
title: Lisa Butler
text: Excellent service from the beginning, easy to book on-line. My car was collected at the time I was given. An e-mail and phone call received when MOT and service was completed. The person I spoke to was very helpful and polite he explained everything to me. My car was returned at the time I was given. Next service and MOT was automatically booked in for next year. I would use them again
